antispoof-conflict-top: Tʋmtʋm kaŋa yʋ'ʋr "$1" {{PLURAL:$2|}} nwɛnɛ banɛ dɔl nwa hali {{PLURAL:$2|tʋmtʋm yʋ'ʋr|tʋmtʋmnib yʋ'ʋda}}:
antispoof-conflict-bottom: Fa' m bɛlimnɛ maligim gaŋ tʋmtʋmsia yʋ'ʋr
antispoof-name-illegal:
Fʋ ya'a bɔɔd ye fʋ gu' nwa'asʋg, tʋmtʋm kaŋa yʋ'ʋr "$1" kʋ tun'e tʋm: $2.
Fa' m bɛlimnɛ, gaŋim tʋmtʋm yʋ'ʋr sia.
antispoof-badtype: Tʋmtʋm yʋ'ʋr kanɛ ka ba tis la pʋ nara.
antispoof-prohibited: Tʋmtʋm yʋda pʋ nar ye sɔbbiel linɛ an "$1" paasɛ, bɔzugɔ li kisnɛ.
antispoof-combining: Tʋmtʋm bama yʋ'ʋda kʋ tun'e la'as sɔbbiel $1
antispoof-unassigned: Tʋmtʋm yʋ'ʋda kʋ nyaŋi paas sɔbbiel "$1" bɔzugɔ li anɛ sɔbbiel linɛ ka sɔ' zi'.
antispoof-deprecated: Tʋmtʋm yʋda pʋ nar ye sɔbbiel linɛ an "$1" paasɛ, bɔzugɔ li kisnɛ.
antispoof-noletters: Di sʋm ye tʋmtʋm yʋda paas sɔbbiel ayinne bɛɛ babʋg.
antispoof-mixedscripts: Tʋmtʋm yʋda kʋ tun'e paas sɔbbiela banɛ yi sɔb kɔn'ɔb kɔn'ɔb nɛ.
antispoof-tooshort: Tʋmtʋm yʋkanɛ ka fʋ tis la gimnɛ hali.
antispoof-ignore: Zan'asim banɛ pʋ dɔl din nar si'em la vɛɛnsʋg.
antispoof-ignore-help: Tisim tʋmtʋmnib suor ka ba yɔ'ɔg akaunt hali baa li yʋ'ʋr nwaans nɛ akaunt banɛ pʋn bɛ.
